title: Everytime I try to open hextech crafting I crash
body: Any ideas? Already tried to repair.

replies.body: We've been tracking an issue where some players have been crashing while opening hextech crafting, and believe it may have something to do with the recent Windows update.  It could be something else entirely, though.  For example, some third party apps have been causing this problem so I recommend disabling any that directly interact with League.  These include apps like Play.tv, Overwolf, etc.  Let me know if that helps!
